location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushere [Bushire], to Charles Crommelin, President and Governor at Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is an update of affairs at Bushire, giving reasons of security as justification for the detenion of the Tartar,and news of the movements of both Carem Khaun [Karim Khan] and Meer Mahanna [Mīr Muhanna]. Also reports the raid on a caffala between Bushire and Schirass [Shiraz] by Mīr Muhanna's men.
